description.en: HashBridge is a fully decentralized oracle network powered by nodes which return replies to data request, instead of using a single monolithic node, HashBridge has a collection of different nodes divided up into 30 institution nodes and 5 community nodes. Every node can participate in price feed by depositing HBO — the native governance token issued by HashBridge.
